segments.text: I wish it was a nicer day today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is true . I hope it doesn't rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It wouldn't rain in the middle of the summer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It wouldn't seem right if it started raining right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It would be weird if it started raining in ninety degree weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any rain right now would be pointless .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right , it really would be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want it to cool down some .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean , I can't wait until it's winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Winter is great . I wish it didn't get so cold sometimes though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would rather deal with the winter than the summer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel the same way .
segments.speaker: S2
